price: 2. y veas a la gente entrar en la religión de Al-lah en multitudes,
arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wara-ayta al-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīni al-lahi afwājan
